TableField.name: ElevatedWorkPermitID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track elevated work permits

TableField.name: JobNumber
TableField.phrase: Job Number|The unique number assigned to the job requiring elevated work. This number is typically assigned by an engineering or maintenance dapartment

TableField.name: PermitNumber
TableField.phrase: Permit Number|The unique number assigned to the permit used for elevated work and placed at the area where the elevated work is to be performed. The permit ID can be used as the permit number because it is a unique, automatically generated, numbering system

TableField.name: WorkOrderID
TableField.phrase: Work Order|The work order associated with the elevated work activity when applicable

ForeignField.name: WOOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: W.O. Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: WOOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: W.O. Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: WorkOrderNo
ForeignField.phrase: Work Order Number|A unique number assigned to the work order. This number is usually assigned by a maintenance and engineering department and is pre-printed on work order forms

ForeignField.name: WorkOrder
ForeignField.phrase: Work Order|The work order associated with the elevated work activity when applicable
ForeignField.sample: 3413 | Repair diamond plate walkway on scanner | 02/02/2006 | In Progress

RemoteField.name: RequestTime
RemoteField.phrase: Request Date|The date and time the elevated work permit was requested

RemoteField.name: ElevatedWorkTime
RemoteField.phrase: Elevated Work Date|The date and time the elevated work is scheduled to occur

RemoteField.name: ExpirationTime
RemoteField.phrase: Expiration Date|The date and time the elevated work permit is scheduled to expire

TableField.name: ElevatedWorkShiftID
TableField.phrase: Elevated Work Shift|The shift during which the elevated work is scheduled to occur

CodeField.name: ElevatedWorkShift
CodeField.phrase: Elevated Work Shift|The shift during which the elevated work is scheduled to occur

TableField.name: ElevatedWorkID
TableField.phrase: Elevated Work|An automatically assigned number used to track elevated work activity throughout the organization

ForeignField.name: OrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the elevated work activity occurs

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the elevated work activity occurs

ForeignField.name: LocationID
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the elevated work activity occurs

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the elevated work activity occurs
ForeignField.sample: Cold Storage Receiving Area; Cold Storage No. 6

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Elevated Work Type|A title or phrase used to describe the type of elevated work

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group elevated work of similar types

CodeField.name: ElevatedWorkCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group elevated work of similar types

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkTitleGuide
ForeignField.phrase: Elevated Work Type|A title or phrase used to describe the elevated work type

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkDescGuide
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the elevated work type
ForeignField.sample: A scaffolding constructed for short term use. Short term scaffolding is intended for use of periods less than one month

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Elevated Work Title|A word or short phrase used to identify the elevated work activity
ForeignField.sample: Maintenance repair of the evaporative coolers

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of this elevated work activity and any special characteristics associated with the work
ForeignField.sample: Regular maintenance is scheduled to occur on the evaporative coolers at least once every six months and occurs under extremely cold and slippery conditions

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWorkType
ForeignField.phrase: Elevated Work Type|A title or phrase used to describe the type of elevated work

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountableID
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with the elevated work activity

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with the elevated work activity

ForeignField.name: FullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Work Phone|Telephone number of the individual accountable for managing the elevated work activity

ForeignField.name: Mobile
ForeignField.phrase: Mobile Phone|Mobile telephone number of the individual accountable for managing the elevated work activity

ForeignField.name: ContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: Accountable Contact|The contact information of the person assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with the elevated work activity

ForeignField.name: EmergencyPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Phone|Telephone number to be called in the case of an elevated work emergency

ForeignField.name: LastReviewDate
ForeignField.phrase: Last Review|The date of the last formal review of the elevated work activity

ForeignField.name: ElevatedWork
ForeignField.phrase: Elevated Work|The specific elevated work scheduled to be performed under condition of an elevated work permit
ForeignField.sample: Welding Within the Dry Warehouse; Active Agenda, HQ

TableField.name: Explanation
TableField.phrase: Explanation|An explanation of the elevated work to be performed
TableField.sample: A handrail needs to be welded into place on line 1 in the production area. This work will require grinding, torch cutting and arc welding

TableField.name: KeyLearnings
TableField.phrase: Key Learnings|Information learned during the elevated work activity that may be useful to others performing similar elevated work in the same or similar area
TableField.sample: Cool water should be applied to the feet of the production platform at 30 minute intervals to avoid combustion of the floor.

TableField.name: SpecialHazards
TableField.phrase: Special Hazards|Special elevated work hazards that should be captured and recorded so that all persons performing similar work will be aware of the dangers
TableField.sample: The mix augar switch is mislabeled as the 'Intercom Switch' and can result in inadvertent activation of the mix augar by people trying to use the intercom.

RemoteField.name: PermitIssuedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the elevated work permit

ForeignField.name: PermitIssuedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the elevated work permit

RemoteField.name: SupervisorID
RemoteField.phrase: Supervisor Notified|The supervisor notified in the area where the elevated work is to occur

ForeignField.name: Supervisor
ForeignField.phrase: Supervisor Notified|The supervisor notified in the area where the elevated work is to occur

RemoteField.name: PerformedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Performed By|The name of the primary person performing the elevated work

ForeignField.name: PerformedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Performed By|The name of the primary person performing the elevated work

TableField.name: PerformerRelationshipID
TableField.phrase: Performer Relationship|The relationship of the person performing the elevated work activity to the organization where the activity will occur

CodeField.name: PerformerRelationship
CodeField.phrase: Performer Relationship|The relationship of the person performing the elevated work activity to the organization where the activity will occur

RemoteField.name: FollowUpReviewByID
RemoteField.phrase: Follow Up Review By|The name of the person conducting the follow-up review of the work area to confirm the area is free of materials posing a risk of injury if falling from the elevated surface

ForeignField.name: FollowUpReviewBy
ForeignField.phrase: Follow Up Review By|The name of the person conducting the follow-up review of the work area to confirm the area is free of materials posing a risk of injury if falling from the elevated surface

RemoteField.name: RiskAssessorID
RemoteField.phrase: Risk Assessment By|The name of the person performing the risk assessment to ensure the elevated work area has incorporated all pre-defined precautions

ForeignField.name: RiskAssessor
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Assessment By|The name of the person performing the risk assessment to ensure the elevated work area has incorporated all pre-defined precautions

RemoteField.name: ERTMemberID
RemoteField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the elevated work and who remains available in the event that an elevated work injury response becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTMember
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the elevated work and who remains available in the event that an elevated work injury response becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTFullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Work Phone|Telephone number of the emergency response team member at their place of work with a lable to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ERTMobile
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Mobile Phone|Mobile telephone number of the emergency response team member

ForeignField.name: ERTFullPager
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Pager|Pager number and PIN of the emergency response team member

ForeignField.name: ERTContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Contact|The contact information of the emergency response team member assigned to monitor the elevated work activity

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: ElevatedWorkPermit
CombinedField.phrase: Elevated Work Permit|A combined field used to describe this elevated work permit when associating it with related records

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Barriers to success
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data collection methods, locations, and resources should be entered here. DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific questions that are frequently asked of administrators or implementers should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see the types of questions collected, and answers provided, by the Active Agenda community relating to the subject matter of this module.
